name: Rocket Landing (dgoldaraz)
description:
In this game you need to save your delivery company landing your merchandise rocket in different scenarios. You will need to deal with the obstacles in the field, different gravities, the weight of your rocket (depending of the fuel) and more!

This game is the result of my own implementation of a RigidBody in Unity3D.

The controls are:

- Keyboard Arrows to move your rocket

- R key to restart the level

- M to go to the Menu

- Esc to quit the game

Feedback/Contact : dgoldaraz@gmail.com
